name: Losing Socks Socks!
description:
One thing we know about socks is, of each pair is lost only the left. Or the right.

Help the clumsy protagonist collect all of his magical socks while utilizing their superpowers.
You can only wear two at a time, however... If you find a match, you get to keep the power!
Finding socks is fun.
But losing socks...
... no good!

Controls (just in case):
A&D or Left&Right - move
Space or W or Up - jump (hold to jump higher)
S or Down - go through door / wear sock / look at a look spot  / show worn socks
Esc or M or P - map

Num 5 - NoClip (also just in case)
